attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suffolk Middle Schools are under threat to be closed down in favour of a Two Tier System. 

This is not what the parents want in Suffolk. The majority are against the change and are exceedingly worried about the damaging affects on the children's education whilst all the change will happen. 

It is just change for change sake. Their is not a signifigant reason why it should change.

Please Save Our Middle Schools?
